channel.title: Lime on Michal Kapusta
channel.description: Recent content in Lime on Michal Kapusta

item.title: Predicting residential property prices in Bratislava using recipes - H2o Machine learning (part II)
item.author: michal.kapusta@gmail.com (Michal Kapusta)
item.description: Summary In the previous post [link] (https://www.michal-kapusta.com/post/forecasting_house_prices/) we have used the data from the live listing website and created a linear model that predicted apartment prices.
